settings.title: What makes our collagen different?
settings.text:
Our products have many innovations that separate them from conventional collagen products.

  • Nano-hydrolyzed for Maximum Absorption: ProT Gold Collagen is broken down naturally with a fruit enzyme (not heat or acids like other products) to a molecular weight of 2000 - 5000 daltons. This allows certain peptide bonds in the protein to remain intact while also facilitating incredibly rapid digestion and absorption. ProT Gold is proven to digest 4x faster than other protein supplements. 
  • Complete Protein with 22 Amino Acids: While native collagen is exceptionally high in certain amino acids, it is naturally an incomplete protein which is missing some crucial ones. We fortify ProT Gold with Tryptophan, Histidine, Methionine, Glutamine, Cysteine, and Taurine to make a complete protein that is more powerful than other collagen products.
  • Manufactured in the USA. Our collagen is produced domestically here in the United States.

settings.title: Is it ok to take ProT Gold when I'm not working out?
settings.text: Yes, you can take it anytime. Many customers take ProT Gold first thing in the morning, right before bed, or various times throughout the day.

settings.title: Do I need to refrigerate ProT Gold?
settings.text: There is no refrigeration required, but it can be. Some of our customers like to refrigerate the product because they enjoy a thicker consistency.

settings.title: Can children or teens use your products?
settings.text: Yes, ProT Gold is perfectly safe for children and young adults.

settings.title: Do your products contain any chemicals covered under California Proposition 65?
settings.text: No! ProT GOLD does NOT contain any chemicals applicable to Proposition 65. Read More

settings.title: What is the protein source?
settings.text: Our primary protein source pure and natural nano-hydrolyzed protein. We use natural fruit enzymes to break down the peptide bonds to create a pure and natural powder. It is Non-GMO and naturally contains no lactose, gluten, or soy.

settings.title: Is ProT Gold made in the USA?
settings.text: ProT Gold is manufactured in the United States. Unlike many other collagen products that are bulk procured from overseas, our OP2 Labs Nano Hydrolyzed Medical-Grade Collagen is made in the United States. We use a proprietary process to create one of the cleanest and purest sources of collagen in the world.

settings.title: Can I take ProT Gold if I have Celiac Disease or Gluten Intolerance?
settings.text: Absolutely. ProT Gold products are Gluten Free.

settings.title: Will ProT Gold help osteoporosis and if so, how much of the liquid daily can you safely take?
settings.text: Collagen is what your body uses to heal almost every tissue including bone and our ProT Gold formula is proven to accelerate healing. Read More

settings.title: Can I take ProT Gold if I have diabetes?
settings.text: ProT Gold products are safe for diabetics, containing only 9mg of potassium and trace amounts of phosphates per serving.

settings.title: Do you use artificial sweeteners?
settings.text:
Yes, we use sucralose as a sweetener in many of our products. Based on the predominance of well-designed, peer-reviewed studies, sucralose is regarded as a very safe alternative to sugar by almost all medical professionals.

A recent, scientifically questionable study raised concerns about a specific type of sucralose, sucralose-6-Acetate (S6A). We confirm that S6A is not present in our sucralose even at 0.001% sensitivity level.

settings.title: Can I take ProT Gold if I have IBD (Crohn's disease)?
settings.text: Yes! Our products are made up of a proprietary nano-hydrolyzed collagen protein. Collagen is the most abundant substance in the skin, connective tissue, muscles, and tendons, besides water. It's also the most important set of amino acids in the lining of the colon, working as the preferred source of energy for structure and healing. This building block is essential for restoring the integrity of a battered intestinal lining. Read More

settings.title: What type of sweetener do you use in your products?
settings.text:
ProT Gold Liquid Protein uses Sucralose because we distribute to customers and medical facilities all over the world.

ProT Gold Powder uses Stevia.  Many versions of Stevia on the marketplace are not as natural as they claim because they use chemical extraction methods. We use the natural Stevia plant which makes the product slightly bitter.

settings.title: Can I take ProT GOLD if I have IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)?
settings.text: Yes! ProT GOLD products are safe to consume by individuals diagnosed with Irritable Bowel Syndrome, also referred to as IBS.

settings.title: Can I use ProT Gold for dialysis?
settings.text:
Yes, ProT GOLD is effective for nutritional support for your ESRD patients on Hemodialysis. Oral protein supplementation assists in addressing the catabolic effects of Hemodialysis.

Rich in nitrogen-donor amino acids critical to address conditions and disease states that deplete protein stores. Low in phosphorus and potassium.

Uniquely powerful formulation with an enhanced and fortified amino acid profile. A complete protein supplement with all essential, non-essential, and conditionally essential amino acids. Nano-Hydrolyzed and rapid absorption. Read More

settings.title: What is Nano-Hydrolyzed Collagen?
settings.text: ProT Gold Collagen Protein is naturally hydrolyzed with a proteolytic (fruit) enzyme (no heat, acids, or chemicals) to a molecular level of 2000-4000 daltons and is manufactured in the USA.

settings.title: Does ProT Gold contain Type  1, 2, or 3 collagen?
What is the thickness of ProT Gold?
settings.text: ProT Gold liquid protein has been determined to be of nectar-like consistency for clinical healthcare use. Under the IDDSI framework it is a level 3 (moderately thick) drink.

settings.title: What is the osmolality of ProT Gold?
settings.text: The Osmolality is 3,337 for ProT Gold Liquid Protein. Read More
